about_the_game:
Ameena: Witchborn Duelist Demo - A Prelude to Vengeance


Dive into the "Ameena: Witchborn Duelist" demo, a glimpse into a dark fantasy realm where strategic card duels lead the charge to vengeance. This demo version, featuring 17 characters, 4 thematic procedurally generated maps, and 44 unique cards, focuses purely on direct level combat enhanced with a random artifact reward system. Unlike the full game, the demo does not include a shop, path choices on the map, or card modification between levels, spotlighting the core game mechanics.

Demo Features and Limitations


The demo strips down to the essence of combat, offering players a taste of the strategic depth with a selection of cards and characters from the broader game. It's designed to showcase the tactical gameplay of "Ameena: Witchborn Duelist" without the additional layers of strategy introduced through shop purchases, path decisions, and card modifications that the full game offers.



  • Attack Cards: Inflict damage on your opponents with these single-use cards.
  • Spell Cards: Cast spells with lasting effects to strategize over multiple turns.
  • Trap Cards: Block your opponents' moves and open up strategic planning opportunities.
  • Boost Cards: Enhance your abilities, strength, and attributes.
  • Shielding Cards: Defend against your opponents' attacks and introduce new defensive tactics.
  • Hero Cards: Unlock special cards that offer unique abilities and turn the tide of battle.

Why Play the Demo?


By playing the demo, you not only familiarize yourself with the game's mechanics but also contribute to its development. Your feedback and suggestions will help shape the game's evolution, adding new ideas and refinement to the journey of Ameena. This demo is your first step into a world of strategy, magic, and revenge, inviting you to be a part of creating a captivating game experience.

Your Role in Shaping Ameena's World


Join us in this early adventure of "Ameena: Witchborn Duelist." Your insights and creative suggestions are invaluable, offering a unique opportunity to influence the game's direction. Engage with the demo, explore its strategic depths, and let your ideas flow. Together, we can forge a memorable path of vengeance and magic in the ever-evolving saga of Ameena.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore the demo of a dark fantasy quest, uniting card duels, deck builder mechanics, and roguelike exploration. Avenge your mother using strategy and magic in ever-evolving realms.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish
